group.name: Plugin Commands: Tunneling Client
group.description: The Tunneling Client Plugin contributes several commands to the application framework's CLI. These commands may be used to create messages related to opening and closing a tunnel between two devices.

command.description: Request a Tunneling cluster tunnel with a server.

arg.name: server
arg.description: The network address of the server to which the request will be sent.

arg.name: clientEndpoint
arg.description: The local endpoint from which the request will be sent.

arg.name: serverEndpoint
arg.description: The remote endpoint to which the request will be sent.

arg.name: protocolId
arg.description: The protocol id of the requested tunnel.

arg.name: manufacturerCode
arg.description: The manufacturer code of the requested tunnel.

arg.name: flowControlSupport
arg.description: 1 if flow control support is requested or 0 if not.

command.description: Transfer data to a server through a Tunneling cluster tunnel.

arg.name: tunnelIndex
arg.description: The index of the tunnel through which to send the data.

arg.name: data
arg.description: The data to send through the tunnel.

arg.name: tunnelIndex
arg.description: The index of the tunnel to close.

command.description: Print out the status of active tunnels.
